name: Welcome to Rise as One
subject: Welcome to Rise as One Basketball Program!
body:
Dear {parentName},

Welcome to the Rise as One Basketball Program! We're excited to have {childName} join our basketball family.

Your payment plan has been set up for ${amount} per {frequency}. You can view your payment schedule in your parent portal.

If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to contact us.

Best regards,
Rise as One Team

name: Payment Reminder - 7 Days
subject: Payment Reminder: ${amount} Due in 7 Days
body:
Hi {parentName},

This is a friendly reminder that your payment of ${amount} is due on {dueDate}.

You can make your payment through our secure parent portal or contact us if you need assistance.

Thank you for your continued support!

Rise as One Team

name: Payment Reminder - 1 Day
subject: Payment Due Tomorrow: ${amount}
body:
Dear {parentName},

Your payment of ${amount} is due tomorrow ({dueDate}).

Please ensure your payment is submitted to avoid any late fees.

Pay now through your parent portal or contact us immediately if you need assistance.

Thank you,
Rise as One Team

name: Payment Overdue Notice
subject: Overdue Payment Notice - Action Required
body:
Dear {parentName},

Your payment of ${amount} was due on {dueDate} and is now overdue.

Please submit your payment immediately to avoid suspension from the program. A late fee of $25 may apply.

Contact us if you're experiencing financial difficulties - we're here to help.

Rise as One Administration

name: Payment Confirmation
subject: Payment Received - Thank You!
body:
Hi {parentName},

Thank you! We've received your payment of ${amount} on {paymentDate}.

Your account is now up to date. Your next payment of ${nextAmount} is due on {nextDueDate}.

Appreciate your prompt payment!

Rise as One Team

name: Practice Reminder
subject: Practice This Week - {practiceDate}
body:
Hi {parentName},

Reminder: {childName} has basketball practice this {dayOfWeek} at {practiceTime}.

Location: Main Gym
Please ensure {childName} brings:
- Basketball shoes
- Water bottle
- Practice jersey

See you there!
Coach Mike

name: Game Day Announcement
subject: Game Day: {teamName} vs {opponent}

name: Contract Renewal Notice
subject: Contract Renewal Required
body:
Dear {parentName},

Your contract for the Rise as One Basketball Program expires on {expirationDate}.

To continue {childName}'s participation in the program, please:
1. Review the updated contract in your parent portal
2. Sign and submit the renewal
3. Update any payment plan preferences

Renewal deadline: {renewalDeadline}

Contact us with any questions.

Rise as One Administration
